subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Basketball fan Ernie Morris returned last Monday for a 54th summer to the world’s most famous outdoor arena, Rucker Park, a hallowed, windswept patch of Harlem asphalt.
snippet: Basketball fan Ernie Morris returned last Monday for a 54th summer to the world’s most famous outdoor arena, Rucker Park, a hallowed, windswept patch of Harlem asphalt.
